w3Mail Struct Reference
[Client]

#include <w3smtp.h>


Data Fields

char * recipient
char * sender
char * data

Detailed Description

The mail data structure. The user does not necessarily need to know about this, but can use w3CreateMail() and w3DestroyMail() instead.
